body: My husband and I have lived in the same house for 34 years and are of exemplary character, but we have never been called for jury service, while two neighbours have been jurors more than once. How are juries chosen? Veronica Piekosz, Great Smeaton, Northallerton, N Yorks • Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com. Please include name, address and phone number.
webTitle: Why have I never been called for jury service?
